name: export_table_to_file
description: Export data from a SQLite table or join query to a CSV or Excel file.

from_clause.description: The FROM clause, which can be a table name or a JOIN expression (e.g., 'table1 JOIN table2 ON ...').

oneOf.description: A comma-separated string of columns to select (e.g., 'column1, column2').
A list of column names to select.

columns.description: Columns to select from the table(s). Defaults to '*'.

save_to_file.description: Path to the output file where the results will be saved. Must end with '.csv', '.xlsx', '.json', or '.jsonl'.
